★★ Are you looking for a CHEAP, RELIABLE, and HIGH QUALITY VPS Hosting Provider? ★★

★★ Are you tired of OVERPAYING your old hosting provider for a service that just isn't right? ★★

The solution is here!

GreenValueHost is the web hosting industry's #1 "budget premium" hosting provider, specializing in providing our clients with high quality and affordable hosting solutions in 5 of our world class data center locations (Buffalo, Chicago, Dallas, Los Angeles, and Amsterdam).

We are a privately owned hosting company (Green Value Hosting, Inc) registered in the U.S. state of Illinois since October, 2012. We host tens of thousands of websites from thousands of clients around the world, and we would love to have the opportunity of serving you!

★★ GreenValueHost is OVERSTOCKED! Thanks to recently generous private offerings from our upstream datacenters ColoCrossing and QuadraNet, we've stocked up on a MASSIVE amount of extra hardware, nodes, and IPv4 addresses! ★★

We can't just have all of this lying around, we want to share the savings so that our clients can benefit as well! From April 23 until May 7, 2014, we are having a HUGE SPRING OVERSTOCK SALE on all VPS hosting services!


Managed VPS Offer 1: SAVE 40% OFF RECURRING on ANY FULLY MANAGED VPS HOSTING PLAN on ANY BILLING TERM
EXCLUSIVE Promotional Coupon Code: MANAGEDVPSOVERSTOCK40

Managed VPS Offer 2: SAVE 55% OFF RECURRING on ANY FULLY MANAGED VPS HOSTING PLAN on YEARLY BILLING TERMS

BONUS PROMOTION: BUY A MANAGED VPS IN ANY US LOCATION AND RECEIVE 5 EXTRA IPv4 ADDRESSES FOR FREE!! NO COUPON CODE NEEDED
